sentence: yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya, na tāv'āhaṃ, āvuso, etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ vyattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī'ti, pācittiyaṃ.
